txt.en: Lân Mefam is located east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should collect Half-troll axes by defeating Half-trolls in Lân Mefam.
Bring the Half-troll axes to Anborn
Half-troll axes should be collected and brought to Anborn as proof that you have completed your mission to disrupt the enemy gathered at Lân Mefam.

'This is proof enough that you have completed your mission. We will be able to rework the metal in these axes into fine arrowheads. Nothing like piercing your enemy with their own weapons. I commend your efforts.\n\n'If you are finished with Thurindol's mission then we should discuss upholding my end of our agreement.'
Lân Mefam is located east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should collect Half-troll axes by defeating Half-trolls in Lân Mefam.
Anborn can be found in the keep at Bâr Húrin.\n\nShow Anborn the Half-troll axes you collected.

You need some way to show the Rangers that you've completed your mission to disrupt the Haradrim at Lân Mefam. Half-trolls patrol the paths of Lân Mefam. Perhaps returning to Anborn with a few Half-troll axes will convince him of your heroics and earn his trust.
Collect Half-troll axes at Lân Mefam
